long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FaviconStealer - Sneakily Collecting Icons from Websites You Visit

Stealthily pilfer favicons from every website you browse. Surf the web as usual and watch your loot grow!

FaviconStealer "steals" the icons from every website you visit. Just browse the internet as you normally would and witness your collection of pilfered favicons expand. It's fun, utterly useless, and completely free!

Key Features:
1. Automatic Pilfering: Silently swipes favicons from every site you visit, no action required.
2. Visual Showcase: Displays your "loot" in a sleek grid layout.
3. Privacy Assured: All data stays local - we're icon thieves, not data thieves!
4. Fun Factor: Adds a quirky twist to your everyday web surfing.
5. Memory Lane: Revisit your online footprints through icons.

Why Install It?
- Pure Entertainment: No pressure, no purpose, just fun!
- Unique Collection: Own your personal web icon museum.
- Surprise Discovery: Stumble upon forgotten interesting sites.
- Zero Hassle: Doesn't affect your normal browsing experience at all.

Whether you're a web surfing pro or a casual user, FaviconStealer adds a dash of whimsy to your online life. Start your icon heist journey now and see how quickly you can amass 100 different favicons!

FaviconStealer works locally and doesn't send data anywhere, so your "criminal activities" remain private.

Install now and make your web adventures more iconic!
